 step 1:
  
  gcloud artifacts repositories create vlt-generate-batchrequest-docker \
    --repository-format=docker \
    --location=us-central1
	
	
	
  step 2:
  
  gcloud builds submit --config cloudbuild.yaml .
  
  
  
 ------------------------
 
  step 1:
  
  gcloud artifacts repositories create vlt-chunk-bq-content-docker \
    --repository-format=docker \
    --location=us-central1
	
	
	
  step 2:
  
  gcloud builds submit --config cloudbuild.yaml .
